alert.note: Alert for Flat Tops; Upper Yampa River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 08 at 2:13PM MST until January 10 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TUESDAY TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Upper Yampa River Basin and Flat Tops. * WHEN...From 11 AM Tuesday to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially on ridge tops and mountain passes. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Flat Tops; Upper Yampa River Basin
